main event: A civilian in Akron, Ohio reported seeing an unidentified flying object on February 22, 1961.
interesting points: The object was sighted within 600 feet of the observer, but no details were provided about its shape, size, or motion.
The object appeared to suddenly appear and rush away at times, and also changed brightness.
The object moved behind and in front of clouds during the sighting.
The edges of the object were described as fuzzy or blurred.
The object made a 'fuzzy or hissing' sound and appeared silvery in color.
